## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have run `task fmt` to format the code
- [ ] I have run `task vet` and addressed any issues
- [ ] I have run `task lint` and addressed any issues
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] I have added comments to my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have updated relevant example files
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

### Security

- [ ] My changes don't introduce new security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have not committed any sensitive information (tokens, passwords, etc.)
- [ ] I have verified file permissions are appropriate
